EmailTemplate.name: 20141029 - KS2 Coffee and Chat
EmailTemplate.subject: KS2 Coffee and Chat
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
You are cordially invited to our Coffee and Chat event for Key Stage 2 (Years 3, 4, 5 & 6) Parents. Details of the event are as follows:
Key Stage 2 Coffee and Chat Date : 7th November 2014 (Friday) Time : 8am - 9am Venue : Primary Canteen
Please RSVP by filling in and submitting the online form below: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1bV-BA-GQHZbeyXwTu1qvF-ujgQkrZQqzUsWvmFOTycA/viewform
Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions.
Kind regards,
Admin Team British International School Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
